mapper.select:
select scq.*,s.code,s.full_name,s.abbreviation from supplier_cardboard_quotation scq left join supplier s on scq.supplier_Id = s.id where scq.is_deleted =0
and s.code like concat('%', #{code} , '%')
and s.abbreviation like concat('%', #{abbreviation} , '%')
and scq.created_time like concat('%', #{time} , '%')
